en.today: There will be much to process throughout the day, darling Aries, as the Scorpio moon aligns with Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Saturn, and Neptune. Go with what makes you feel empowered and emotionally safe, actively structuring your life to create more space for happiness. Take action on dreams you've been harboring, understanding that you alone are responsible for making these visions a reality. Big emotions bubble up while Jupiter and Chiron square off, and you'll find healing by staying positive and true to yourself. Divine inspiration strikes later tonight once Luna enters Sagittarius and opposes Uranus, adding vibrancy to your ideas.

en.today: Spend the first half of your day nurturing the spirit, dear Leo, as the Scorpio moon aligns with Mars, Mercury, and Jupiter. You'll feel ready to lower your guard and embrace intimacy once Saturn and Neptune activate, helping you find security in companionships. These vibes also help you establish healthier cycles within your relationships. When it comes to partnerships, open the conversation to independent and shared dreams, discussing how you can support one another. As Jupiter and Chiron square off, mindfulness, growth, and healing coincide. Notice if you start to feel restless when Luna enters Sagittarius and opposes Uranus tonight, channeling your energy into creative projects.

en.today: People will be eager for your attention, dear Taurus, as the Scorpio moon aligns with Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Saturn, and Neptune throughout the day. Give energy to those who enrich your life, but prioritize personal balance to ensure you don't become overstimulated. You'll be blessed with an exceptionally alluring aura, and should look for opportunities to gain influence. Romance also has a chance to bloom, mainly when you invest in those who bring out the best in you. Work with positive mantras to find healing while Jupiter and Chiron square off. Enjoy luxury but keep tabs on your spending once Luna enters Sagittarius and opposes Uranus later this evening.

en.today: Get an early start to catch up on work, dear Gemini, as the Scorpio moon aspects Mars, Mercury, and Jupiter. Your efforts will pay off once Saturn and Neptune activate later today, bringing you closer to any dreams of success that you've been nurturing. Continue putting pieces into place, and your big picture will soon come into focus. Avoid shopping online while Jupiter and Chiron square off, and consider taking a break from your screens to enjoy some fresh air. Romantic vibes flow when Luna enters Sagittarius and opposes Uranus tonight, sending bolts of electricity to the heart.
